channel.title: Easy Supra on Connector 365 Online Help
channel.description: Recent content in Easy Supra on Connector 365 Online Help

item.title: Brief description / overview
item.description: Brief description / overview This documentation contains explanations on the integration, functionality and use of Easy Supra in a Microsoft Dynamics™ 365 Business Central environment. The product can also be used for earlier versions (from NAV 4.x). Please contact your Microsoft Dynamics partner in this regard. The supplier evaluation enables the execution of a company-specific and independent classification of suppliers. Here it is possible to define several evaluations over a flexible validity period for certain vendors, so that vendor groups can be evaluated differently.

item.title: User rights to be extended / Changed objects
item.description: User rights to be extended / Changed objects The user rights are to be extended according to the object tables. item.title: Function description
item.description: Function description In Microsoft Dynamics 365 Business Central, supplier rating has its own menu item. menu item in the Administration section. Below that, the reports (evaluations), the setup (wizard) and the history are integrated. Figure 2: Easy Supra in the main menu.
